name: Forgotten Lands
description:
This is a pre-alpha version of Forgotten Lands by Isolation Media.

Just Comment us about how to improve

or share your idea in our official discord server of our official media partner ASSS GROUP:  https://discord.gg/RBDfhEf

Enjoy being a forgotten princess in a journey of forgotten land, See the beautiful monument and unleash the journey rich of beauty and impossibilities....

Pre ALPHA version: (UPDATED - V0.3)

 3  level included:

1.THE DARK SIDE                                   

2.THE IMMINENT

3.THE LIVING SEA
